department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Steve Zacharias graduated, barely, from the University of Wisconsin in 1970, drove out to Hollywood and broke into television, writing for Partridge Family, Happy Days, and winning an Emmy for his story Edith's Problem on All in the Family...After twelve years, Mr. Zacharias co-wrote Revenge of the Nerds and ended up writing eight movies that included Eddie, In the Army Now, and Johnny Be Good...Mr. Zacharias is very old now, but digs back to teach, which he loves, along with interacting with the students, which he also loves...
